temperature_conversion_c_to_f.gloss: convert temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit

temperature_conversion_f_to_c.gloss: convert temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius

temperature_conversion_c_to_k.gloss: convert temperature from Celsius to Kelvin

first_law_thermodynamics.gloss: the change in internal energy equals heat added minus work done

heat_transfer.gloss: heat transferred due to temperature change
heat_transfer.exec: lambda m, c, dT: m * c * dT

heat_transfer_phase_change.gloss: heat required for a phase change at constant temperature

ideal_gas_law.gloss: relationship between pressure, volume, temperature, and moles of gas
ideal_gas_law.exec: lambda P, V, n, R, T: P * V - n * R * T

work_isothermal_expansion.gloss: work done by an ideal gas during isothermal expansion
work_isothermal_expansion.formula: W = n * R * T * ln(V2 / V1)
work_isothermal_expansion.exec: lambda math, n, R, T, V1, V2: n * R * T * math.log(V2 / V1)

enthalpy_change.gloss: change in enthalpy for constant pressure processes
enthalpy_change.exec: lambda m, cp, dT: m * cp * dT

entropy_change_isothermal.gloss: entropy change for an isothermal process

entropy_change_temperature.gloss: entropy change for heating or cooling at constant heat capacity
entropy_change_temperature.exec: lambda math, m, c, T1, T2: m * c * math.log(T2 / T1)

carnot_efficiency.gloss: maximum theoretical efficiency of a heat engine

thermal_conduction.gloss: rate of heat transfer through a material
thermal_conduction.exec: lambda k, A, dT, L: k * A * dT / L

thermal_expansion_linear.gloss: change in length due to temperature change
thermal_expansion_linear.exec: lambda alpha, L0, dT: alpha * L0 * dT

thermal_expansion_volume.gloss: change in volume due to temperature change
thermal_expansion_volume.exec: lambda beta, V0, dT: beta * V0 * dT
